actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 with respect to the amount of the net project cost paid by the United States.

summary.text: Increases, under the National Capital Transportation Act, the Federal share of that portion of the net project cost of the Adopted Regional System incurred during fiscal years beginning after June 30, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Capital Transportation Act of 1969 with respect to the amount of the net project cost paid by the United States.
